columns.Race_ID: The unique identifier for each race.
columns.Name: The title of the race event.
columns.Class: The classification type of the race.
columns.Date: The scheduled date for the race.
columns.Track_ID: The identifier linking to the race track.

race.table_description: The table tracks specific race events and their details.

columns.Track_ID: The unique identifier for each race track.
columns.Name: The official name of the race track.
columns.Location: The geographical location of the race track.
columns.Seating: The total seating capacity of the race track.
columns.Year_Opened: The year when the race track was opened.

track.table_description: The table stores detailed information about various race tracks.
